title: Want to Buy P-2 Sweet Caporal pins of Marquard and Warhop

posts.post_title: Want to Buy P-2 Sweet Caporal pins of Marquard and Warhop
posts.post_content:
Hey guys, I am down to the last 2 pins in the set and I am hoping that someone has mercy on me  I'll pay above "book," any decent shape on these 2 pins is ok and I'll pay a "finder's fee" if someone can help me get these two. Thanks.
tbob
